ComicInfo.Penciller: Bernie Wrightson,Paul Lee,Scott Musgrove,Paul Pope,Joe Sacco,Bernie Wrightson,Paul Lee,Scott Musgrove,Paul Pope,Joe Sacco
ComicInfo.Summary: Bernie Wrightson, Paul Pope, Harvey Pekar, and John Bolton! Editor Bob Schreck continues to mix it up in Dark Horse Presents, the greatest anthology on the market! Where else could you find one of the most talented macabre artists of the century drawing one of the coolest monsters of film and comics? Bernie Wrightson teams up with red-hot Spiderman author Ron Marz for a two-part Aliens story! This is the finest pen-and-ink work you're likely to see this year, and the creepiest interpretation of the big bugs in a long time. And if you've somehow missed Paul Pope's self-published work, part one of the year-long "One Trick Rip Off" will show you why this new guy got all those Eisner nominations his first time out of the gate. This issue also features underground luminaries Harvey Pekar and Joe Sacco, and a hard-boiled cop tale by Steve Niles and Paul Lee, which connects to the stunning back cover painting by John Bolton! This issue's so over-stuffed with greatness, we don't even have room for a letters column!
ComicInfo.Title: Incubation [Part 1]; Iced; The Alienator; The One Trick Rip-Off [Part 1]; A Rose for Greg Selker
ComicInfo.Writer: Ron Marz,Steve Niles,Scott Musgrove,Paul Pope,Harvey Pekar,Ron Marz,Steve Niles,Scott Musgrove,Paul Pope,Harvey Pekar
